dashboard.pageDescription: This is a private page that only logged in users can see. Here you can see an example client management.

list.empty: You have not created any clients yet. Click the button at the top right to add one.

clients.title: Clients

form.errorMessage: An error occured while trying to save the client. Please try again.

clients.upgradeToCreateMore: You have to upgrade your plan to create more clients.

deleteClientModal.title: Delete client
deleteClientModal.description: Do you really want to delete this client? This action cannot be undone.

deleteClient.errorMessage: There was an error trying to delete the client. Please try again.

noSubscriptionAlert.message: You don't have any active subscription. On the free plan, you can only have 1 client. Upgrade to a paid plan to add more clients.
